subject: AM Brief: Tue, 30 Apr 2024
body:
Good morning,

**Overnight Market Summary:**
The tone was risk-on. Tech stocks rallied amid concerns over Lari.

**Key Event Today:** RBA Speech at 14:00 AEST.

**Key Reads for Today:**
- JPM Research: Goodwin, Lebsack and Kemmer upgraded to Neutral
- Bloomberg: Compono tolero tenax substantia tempus absum adhuc adaugeo.
- AFR: Stillicidium cohibeo sursum nemo corporis voco.

--
J.P. Morgan Research
This is an automated daily briefing.
For more information, please contact your representative.

subject: Opportunity at Top-Tier Hedge Fund - Melbourne
body:
⚠️  CAUTION: This email originated from outside of J.P. Morgan. Do not click links or open attachments unless you recognize the sender and know the content is safe.

Hi Thomas,

Your profile stood out given your experience in metals & mining. I'm working with a top-tier hedge fund (~$2bn AUM) seeking a strong junior analyst.

Open to a confidential 10-minute call this week?

Best,
James Robertson

--
James Robertson
Senior Associate
Selby Jennings | Ph: 971.915.3717 x93764

subject: Auto Reply: Out of Office
body:
Thank you for your email.

--
This is an automated response.

I am out of the office on annual leave from Mon Sep 08 2025 07:49:05 GMT+0000 (Coordinated Universal Time) to Sun Oct 05 2025 09:34:15 GMT+0000 (Coordinated Universal Time) with no email access. For urgent matters, please contact Thomas Francis at thomas.francis@jpmorgan.com.

Otherwise, I will respond to your email upon my return.

Thank you.
